data.title: Latino Voters — Tell Us Your #1 Political Issue In 2024
data.meta_description: Latino voters, we want to hear from you!
data.text:
If You're A Latino Voter, Tell Us Who You're Backing In 2024 And Your #1 Issue You're Voting On

Latino voters, we want to hear from you!

Hello, everyone! We're back for round six of BuzzFeed's 2024 Election Diaries!

This bi-weekly series highlights different groups of voters nationwide to find out what political issues are most important to them AND who they plan to support for president in 2024.

This week, we're highlighting the voices of Latino Americans, who make up 15% of the US electorate. So, if you're a Latino voter, we want to know what political issues are most important to you in 2024.

Maybe you're an older immigrant, so your top issue is developing comprehensive immigration policies and a more straightforward path to citizenship for younger generations.

Or maybe, you want politicians to put more effort into climate justice, as you've seen the impact of natural disasters on vulnerable Latino communities.

Or maybe your wage has remained stagnant as the cost of everyday groceries has increased.

Latino voters — whatever your top political issues are, we want to hear about them! Tell us everything via this anonymous Google form.

If you are reading this and you're not a Latino voter, don't worry! New groups of voters will be requested bi-weekly! Also, if you don't qualify for this round but know someone who does, please send it their way.

Share This Article
